channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - December 11, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-december-11-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _1%er Swoop Gang_ * _7th Sea d6_ * _Against the Sith Conspiracy_ * _Apocalypse Keys_ * _Brinkwood Legacy_ * _Escape from Dino Island_ * _GMAC Masters_ * _Girl Underground_ * _Night's Black Agents_ * _Plutonian Shore_ * _Star Wars World_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar Firebase](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
